exec: // Stores the createdUserId in an environment or global variable

request.description:
### Add User Data

This API endpoint is used to add a user by a BDA (Business Development Associate) with appropriate details. The request should be sent as an HTTP POST to `{{local-common-ms}}/v1/api/user/bda/add`.

#### Request Body

- form-data
    
    - `file`: (file) - The file to be uploaded.
        
    - `sheetNo`: (text) - The sheet number.
        

#### Response

- Status: 200
    
- Content-Type: application/json
    

Example response body:

``` json
{
    "statusCode": 0,
    "message": "",
    "responseBody": {
        "createdUserId": [""],
        "bdaUserExcelDtoList": null,
        "invalidExcelRecordDtoList": [
            {
                "row": 0,
                "col": 0,
                "errorMessage": ""
            }
        ]
    }
}

 ```

The `createdUserId` field in the response indicates the user ID of the newly created user.

#### Additional Notes

- Validation is performed on the bankDetails to prevent duplicates.
    
- Validation is performed on the verificationId of bankDetails.
    

WIP

- validation on the bankDetails duplicate
    
- validation on verificationId of bankDetails

response.name: success

request.description:
This API is used to list users. Functionalities

- Can search by
    
    - partial phone no
        
    - full email id
        
    - partial name
        

**Note:** The output list excludes the user requesting.

WIP

- role base access. Only Admin or bda users should have access to this API

response.name: Success
New Request

request.description: This API is used to get auth token to be used in subsequent API calls.

This API is used to update the below details

- name
- phone no
- email
- password
    

**Note:** The purpose of the API is to update details if provided. So, if the details are same as earlier than the same will be thrown as an exception. This is not true for password update.

response.name: Success: Name udpated
Error: Same Phone No
Success: update password
